message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time and effort, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $9,500?
